query:
介绍一下Swarm Network这家中国Shanghai的公司产品。
他主要做Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Web3方面的业务方面。
我需要他进一步的产品介绍，功能介绍，官网链接，服务的客户
answer: Swarm Network（总部位于上海）是一家聚焦人工智能、区块链、去中心化金融（DeFi）和 Web3 生态的技术公司，其核心产品是基于 “Truth Protocol” 的去中心化信息验证与 AI 多代理协作平台，能够将离线数据经由 AI 代理与人类验证者组合、零知识证明等技术转化为可在链上可信使用的隐私保护数据流，支持实时触发的链上逻辑并提供安全、可扩展的私有数据使用场景；在此基础上，Swarm Network 推出了多款面向金融与内容生态的具体业务产品，包括 Rollup News（AI 驱动的事实核查社交平台，已验证逾 300 万条信息）、Swarm Markets（预测市场与资产交易平台）、Agent BUIDL（低代码 AI 代理构建工具）以及一系列面向机构和个人投资者的金融 AI 代理服务，如 Stock Technical Analysis、Stock Monitor、Hedge Fund Tracker、AI Screener、Trading Strategies、AI Stock Picker、Swing Trading、Quant AI、Day‑trading Center、AI Earnings Prediction 与 Whales Auto Tracker 等，可通过服务市场按任务付费或订阅使用；平台提供完整的开发者工具链（API、SDK、Webhooks、文档与测试网 Faucet），并对外开放合作伙伴计划，已为 Rollup News、去中心化预测市场、NFT 真伪验证服务、DAO 治理监控等多家 Web3 项目以及部分对冲基金、量化交易团队和金融信息服务机构提供数据验证、AI 代理和 DeFi 接入服务，帮助它们实现数据可信、自动化决策和链上资产管理，更多信息可访问其官网 https://swarmnetwork.ai/。

results.title: Swarm Network - Decentralized Finance - IQ.wiki
results.content:
Launched in 2024, Swarm Network is a decentralized protocol that seeks to validate and preserve verifiable on-chain information by combining AI agents and human collectives. It utilizes a Truth Protocol, which facilitates decentralized Information Rollups to verify real-world claims. Users and applications access a network of AI agents and human validators, collaborating to reach consensus on data accuracy. [...] By integrating AI processing, human input, and zero-knowledge proofs, Swarm Network aims to provide a trust layer for Web3 applications, focusing on scalability, privacy, and transparency. (#cite-id-sRmjn0Yf4s) (#cite-id-vEFfXFz6OX) (#cite-id-C6EiU2tQI8)

## Architecture

Swarm Network's architecture aims to convert raw off-chain data into verifiable, on-chain information through a series of specialized layers that function together. (#cite-id-vEFfXFz6OX)

### Application Layer [...] The architecture of Swarm Network includes an Application Layer that encompasses user-facing platforms like Rollup News (social verification), Swarm Markets (prediction platform), and Agent BUIDL (AI development).

It also provides integration points, such as social platform APIs, DApp connections, and developer tools, aiming to facilitate interaction and functionality within the network. (#cite-id-sRmjn0Yf4s) (#cite-id-vEFfXFz6OX)

### Truth Protocol

results.title: The Multi-Agent Collaboration Framework a.k.a SWARMS
results.content:
Service Market Place: Your swarm can offer specialized services across the web3 ecosystem—from DeFi market analysis and prediction market validation to NFT authenticity verification and DAO governance monitoring—charging fees for each transaction or task completed.
 Growth & Demand Pipeline: To ensure sustainable growth and continuous value creation, we've established two key pillars that drive our ecosystem forward:

  + Core Initiatives led by the Foundation: [...] Swarm Network’s Multi-Agent Collaboration Framework—powered by Agent BUIDL, the SUI blockchain, and anchored by the Agent License model—offers a path to genuine AI adoption for everyday users. We’ve made it simpler than ever to build, operate, and earn from AI-driven services: whether by combining existing AI frameworks into one cohesive Swarm or by leveraging our no-code tools to spin up new solutions from scratch. [...] # The Multi-Agent Collaboration Framework

At the core of Swarm Network lies our Multi-Agent Collaboration Framework—an interconnected system that orchestrates multiple AI agents (and the humans guiding them) toward common goals. Unlike monolithic AI solutions locked away behind centralized services, our framework emphasizes:

1. Decentralized and Distributed Ownership

results.title: About us - Swarm - The gold standard for blockchain-based finance
results.content:
We believe Web3 represents the intersection of culture and finance, lowering barriers to entry to a financial system where more people can build their wealth.

The ‘financialization of everything’ doesn’t mean everything is for sale but enables you to put your money where your heart is and invest in the assets, causes, people and companies that matter to you.

AS FEATURED IN

For the first time ever, you’ll be able to invest in crypto assets and tokenized securities in a single DeFi venue. [...] Skip to content [...] Get started!

Swarm combines the innovation of DeFi with investor protection. Our trading and investing tools enable you to retain full control of the assets in your wallet, giving you direct access to capital and crypto markets 24/7, without paying for costly intermediaries.

##### Milestones

##### November 2017

The first vote is held in Swarm Network’s DAO on SWM token release schedule.

##### January 2018

SeekingAlpha [...] Adoption of Technology: Swarm Network aims to convert offchain data into verifiable onchain information, already seeing usage from AI-powered fact-checking solution Rollup News, which has verified over 3 million posts.
 Growth of AI Agents in Crypto: AI agents are gaining traction in the crypto space, with predictions that they will become significant users of Ethereum and play a larger role in decentralized communities. [...] Funding for Swarm Network: Decentralized AI protocol Swarm Network raised $13 million to develop an AI verification protocol, with $10 million from licenses for operating agents and $3 million from strategic investors.
 NFT Licenses: The licenses are structured as non-fungible tokens (NFTs) that provide holders with daily rewards for maintaining the network.

## 99% of valuable data is private, restricting it to <1% of Web3’s use cases. Our protocol unlocks this untapped market—making private data usable, verifiable, and on-chain.

results.title: Swarm Network Secures $13 Million in Funding to Enhance ...
results.content:
Swarm Network isn’t merely another player in the decentralized space. Their aim to transform offchain data into verifiable onchain information could solve significant trust issues prevalent in current data management practices. An early adopter of Swarm's system, Rollup News, utilizes this protocol for AI-powered fact-checking, with over three million posts already verified by its users. [...] As we tread further into this integration of AI and blockchain, the benefits could be revolutionary, offering a new paradigm where autonomous AI agents operate on decentralized networks, providing services that are not only efficient but are inherently resistant to manipulation and control. This could redefine trust in digital and real-world applications, marking a pivotal chapter in the evolution of technology. [...] Developers

results.title: Swarm: Digital Freedom now
results.content:
#### No downtime

Swarm is decentralised and distributed, and so it’s also always up, making it stable and reliable.

#### Privacy first

Swarm nodes provide cryptographic support enabling you to use network in an unrestricted way while building blocks like “Single-owner-chunks” enable extraordinary zero-leak privacy.

#### DDOS resistant

Swarm network is fully decentralised peer-to-peer network while it’s resilience against DDoS grows with every additional node in the network. [...] #### Credible neutrality

Swarm is built to not discriminate - it’s in the very nature of our design, and permeates throughout our mission.

Embrace decentralisation

## Build with freedom, scale without limits

Swarm delivers a powerful base-layer stack tailored for forward-thinking users. Privacy-focused and cypherpunk-inspired, it's the decentralised framework for the next generation of creators and advocates.

Swarm stack ->Desktop app ->Get BZZ -> [...] ## Fullstack Decentralised

Swarm completes the vision of consensual computation, decentralised infrastructure, and private messaging, powering open, serverless, and permissionless dapps.

Get started ->

#### Event: Community Call

Swarm Community Call, online, November 27

## Why Swarm Exists

Serverless Cloud ↔ Web3 Infrastructure

## The Backbone of Web3

results.title: AI Swarms: The Future of Decentralized Agent Networks - Bankless
results.content: By using blockchains for secure settlement and transparent record-keeping, these networks can create trustless environments where transactions between agents occur seamlessly. Over time, these decentralized economies may expand into new market niches, encouraging innovation and generating diverse revenue streams. As a result, swarms can seed entire ecosystems of value exchange, facilitating resource allocation and decision-making at a scale that could completely reinvent onchain economies. [...] As swarms evolve, they have the potential to transform nearly every sector. Traditional industries like healthcare, finance, and logistics will use these networks to manage data, optimize complex operations, and improve decision-making at scale. [...] Rather than relying on a single, general-purpose model, we can now orchestrate networks of specialized agents that learn from each other, scale to handle complex challenges, and fluidly adapt to changing conditions. As these collaborative systems prove their worth across DeFi, virtual worlds, decentralized economies, and beyond, they open the door to more efficient operations, richer experiences, and entirely new business models.

results.title: Docker 部署- .NET - Microsoft Learn
results.content:
Docker 容器和网络模型主要用于运行无状态容器和不可变容器。 启动运行 Node.js 或 Nginx 应用程序的群集非常简单。 然而，使用更复杂的解决方案，例如真正的群集或分布式应用程序（如基于Orleans的应用程序），可能会带来设置上的困难。 这是可能的，但不像部署基于 Web 的应用程序那么简单。

Docker 群集涉及将多个主机分组为使用 容器业务流程协调程序管理的单个资源池。 Docker Inc. 提供 Swarm 作为其选项，而 Google 提供 Kubernetes （也称为 K8s）。 其他业务流程协调程序（如 DC/OS 和 Mesos ）存在，但本文档重点介绍 Swarm 和 K8s，因为它们的使用范围更广。

支持在任意位置 Orleans 运行的相同粒度接口和实现也在 Docker 容器上运行。 在 Docker 容器中运行 Orleans 应用程序不需要任何特殊注意事项。 [...] 跳至主要内容   跳到 Ask Learn 聊天体验

# Docker 部署

提示

即使熟悉 Docker 或 Orleans，建议还是通读本文，以避免在已知解决方法中出现潜在问题。

本文及其示例正在不断完善中。 欢迎反馈、PR 或建议。

## 将 Orleans 解决方案部署到 Docker

由于 Docker 编排器和集群堆栈的设计，在 Docker 中部署 Orleans 可能会很棘手。 最复杂的部分是了解 Docker Swarm 和 Kubernetes 网络模型中的 覆盖网络 的概念。 [...] 如果不使用它，则不需要 Kubernetes 安装。 Docker4X 安装程序已包含 Swarm，因此 Swarm 无需额外安装。

注意

在 Windows 上，Docker 安装程序在安装过程中启用 Hyper-V。 由于本文及其示例使用 .NET Core，因此使用的容器映像基于 Windows Server NanoServer。 如果计划改用 .NET Framework 4.6.1，请使用基于 Windows Server Core 和 Orleans 版本 1.4+ 的映像（仅支持 .NET Framework）。

## 创建 Orleans 解决方案

以下说明演示如何使用Orleans工具创建标准`dotnet`解决方案。

根据平台调整命令。 目录结构只是建议;根据需要对其进行调整。
